Summary Looking forward to managing technical stuffs technical leader to cover nationwide and geo market for telecommunication and innovative technlogy including terminal sand equipments 
 
Specialties: excellent communication skills and good networks with telecom and semicon industry 
Big data, Cloud computing, SDN/NFV and various experiences about technogies. Summary Looking forward to managing technical stuffs technical leader to cover nationwide and geo market for telecommunication and innovative technlogy including terminal sand equipments 
 
Specialties: excellent communication skills and good networks with telecom and semicon industry

Specialties: excellent communication skills and good networks with telecom and semicon industry 
Big data, Cloud computing, SDN/NFV and various experiences about technogies. Experience SDN/NFV solution architect Intel April 2015  – Present (5 months) Korea Cover Asia Pacific and Japan Telco SDN/NFV projects including 5G inititives, SDN/NFV, Openstack deployment through Telco customers. Developing NFVI focused project for performance metering and 5G network planning ETS(enterprise technical specialist) Intel Corporation October 1999  – Present (15 years 11 months) Korea From 2012 to now, I mostly focused on big data consulting and incubating Intel big data solution into Korea IT market.  
I got the big interest in SDN, Open Network Computing. 
Inside Intel, I am consulting SDN/NFV and Open Networking Solution to the end customer such as KT, SKT and etc. 
I have experienced with Cloud RAN, SDN switch and NFV platform development. 
I work as Enterprise technical specialist. I am interested in Big Data, RISC Migration, MicroServer, Telecom Infrastructure(Specially Cloud based RAN design, Small/Smart Cell design in LTE networks), FSE Intel January 2006  –  June 2012  (6 years 6 months) Mobile Internet Device Lead('07~now) as who covers the marketing and sales lead for MID 
Preparing for next design with Korean OEMs by Moorestown 
Drive OEMs launched its MIDs toward market such as TG Bobbit, viliv S5,S7,X70ex, S10, M5 and UMID M1. 
MID Korea GTM lead to drive and ramp sales for Viliv, UMID and others Tier2 
Lead UMID and Viliv matchmaking to APAC, EMEA and ASMO resellers and carriers 
Lead virtual team to cover Samsung, LGE and Tier 2 OEMs who develop and sell Portable Media Proessor. 
Drive 13 OEMs with 20 kinds of MID platform. 
Administrator officer of Mobile Internet Device Alliance Forum which is the alliance among ISV, IHV, OSV and Carriers which have the intention to jump into MID market FSE Intel January 2006  –  March 2012  (6 years 3 months) Salse & Marketing position to enable CE device with Semicon Marketing Development manager Intel March 2006  –  November 2008  (2 years 9 months) responsible for marketing activities and marketing development with Dell and Lenovo 
Execute and develop worldwide Dell and Lenovo account strategy  
Increase Market segment Share of Intel Architecture in consumer market up to 90% Account Sales Manager Intel March 2003  –  May 2006  (3 years 3 months) responsible for Humax, KaonMedia, Homecast, Handan and Silicon 7(Pram//MCP vendor) 
Drive design win IPSTB, Intel platform and flash memory 
06' Humax Revenue Double of '05 -Flash memory, 100% Market segment share FAE Intel November 1999  –  December 2005  (6 years 2 months) FAE to cover overall telecom market including equipement, device and hanheld device Field Application Engineer Intel January 2000  –  January 2005  (5 years 1 month) as a pre-sales of Communication Industry sale Group in Intel Korea 
Telecommunication and Consumer Electronics design/business owner: Silicon to System in Intel. Customer base is Samsung, LGE and some Geo strategic customers 
Drive LGE PDA, so called Pearl project and ramp to market with Bulverde  
Specialty on WiMAX, Digital Home, Telecom infrastructure solutions and Embeded Intel Architecture/CPU design 
Worked for WiMAX BDM to cover LGE, Posdata and Carriers such as KT, SKT and Hanaro Telecom. Made MoU deal with LGE and Posdata to adapt Intel's 802.16e solution into its client platform. Work with TTA(Government sponsored standard body) to make 802.16e standardization .

- Major customers were some Telco System Integrators and Telcos. R&D manager MJL December 1993  –  October 1999  (5 years 11 months) R&D manager to develop telecom equipment to serve Telecom Carrier. - Sold the developed system to Shinsegi Telecom and Hanaro Telecom. Sales Amt was about 3M US$.
